HOME.TITLE: WeAct
HOME.SUBTITLE: A platform to propose, vote, and collaborate on concrete actions to address global and social crises.
HOME.MISSION_TEXT: We provide an open, safe, and collaborative digital space where citizens, activists, professionals, and organizations can:
MISSION_LIST: Propose concrete actions to address conflicts, human rights violations, and social or environmental emergencies.
Vote on and discuss the most promising ideas.
Join or offer skills to bring them to life.

ACTIVISTS_NGOS.TITLE: Activists & NGOs
ACTIVISTS_NGOS.TEXT: Looking for a platform to mobilize support.

EDUCATORS_STUDENTS.TITLE: Educators & Students
EDUCATORS_STUDENTS.TEXT: Seeking to engage with real-world issues.
